properties.description: The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Optional) The human-readable name of the object. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters.

properties.name: location_uuid
properties.description: • location_uuid - (Optional) Helps to identify which datacenter an object belongs to. Frankfurt is the default.

properties.name: failover
properties.description: • failover - (Optional) Sets failover mode for this IP. If true, then this IP is no longer available for DHCP and can no longer be related to any server.

properties.name: reverse_dns
properties.description: • reverse_dns - (Optional) Defines the reverse DNS entry for the IP Address (PTR Resource Record).

properties.name: labels
properties.description: • labels - (Optional) List of labels in the format [ "label1", "label2" ].

properties.name: attributes
properties.description: » Attributes
This resource exports the following attributes:

properties.name: name
properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.name: location_uuid
properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.name: failover
properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.name: reverse_dns
properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.name: labels
properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.name: ip
properties.description: Defines the IP Address.

properties.name: prefix
properties.description: The network address and the subnet.

properties.name: status
properties.description: status indicates the status of the object.

properties.name: create_time
properties.description: The time the object was created.

properties.name: change_time
properties.description: Defines the date and time of the last object change.

properties.name: location_country
properties.description: Formatted by the 2 digit country code (ISO 3166-2) of the host country.

properties.name: location_iata
properties.description: Uses IATA airport code, which works as a location identifier.

properties.name: location_name
properties.description: The location name.

properties.name: delete_block
properties.description: Defines if the object is administratively blocked. If true, it can not be deleted by the user.

properties.name: usage_in_minutes
properties.description: The amount of minutes the IP address has been in use.

properties.name: current_price
properties.description: The price for the current period since the last bill.

The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Required) The human-readable name of the object. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters.

properties.name: location_uuid
properties.description: • location_uuid - (Optional) Helps to identify which datacenter an object belongs to. Frankfurt is the default.

properties.name: l2security
properties.description: • l2security - (Optional) Defines information about MAC spoofing protection (filters layer2 and ARP traffic based on MAC source). It can only be (de-)activated on a private network - the public network always has l2security enabled. It will be true if the network is public, and false if the network is private.

properties.name: labels
properties.description: • labels - (Optional) List of labels in the format [ "label1", "label2" ].

properties.description: » Attributes
This resource exports the following attributes:

properties.name: name
properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.name: location_uuid

properties.name: l2security
properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.name: labels
properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.name: status
properties.description: status indicates the status of the object.

properties.name: create_time
properties.description: The time the object was created.

properties.name: change_time
properties.description: Defines the date and time of the last object change.

properties.name: network_type
properties.description: The type of this network, can be mpls, breakout or network.

properties.name: location_country
properties.description: Formatted by the 2 digit country code (ISO 3166-2) of the host country.

properties.name: location_iata
properties.description: Uses IATA airport code, which works as a location identifier.

properties.name: location_name
properties.description: The location name.

properties.name: public_net
properties.description: Is the network public or not.

properties.name: delete_block
properties.description: If deleting this network is allowed.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Required) The human-readable name of the object. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters.

properties.name: cores
properties.description: • cores - (Required) The number of server cores.

properties.name: memory
properties.description: • memory - (Required) The amount of server memory in GB.

properties.name: location_uuid
properties.description: • location_uuid - (Optional) Helps to identify which datacenter an object belongs to. Frankfurt is the default.

properties.name: labels
properties.description: • labels - (Optional) List of labels in the format [ "label1", "label2" ].

properties.name: hardware_profile
properties.description: • hardware_profile - (Optional) The hardware profile of the Server. Options are default, legacy, nested, cisco_csr, sophos_utm, f5_bigip and q35 at the moment of writing. Check the

properties.name: ipv4
properties.description: • ipv4 - (Optional) The UUID of the IPv4 address of the server. When this option is set, the server will automatically be connected to the public network, giving it access to the internet.

properties.name: ipv6
properties.description: • ipv6 - (Optional) The UUID of the IPv6 address of the server. When this option is set, the server will automatically be connected to the public network, giving it access to the internet.

properties.name: isoimage
properties.description: • isoimage - (Optional) The UUID of an ISO image in gridscale. The server will automatically boot from the ISO if one was added. The UUIDs of ISO images can be found in the expert panel.

properties.name: power
properties.description: • power - (Optional) The power state of the server. Set this to true to will boot the server, false will shut it down.

properties.name: availability_zone
properties.description: • availability_zone - (Optional) Defines which Availability-Zone the Server is placed.

properties.name: list description
properties.description: storage - (Optional) Connects a storage to the server.

properties.name: object_uuid
properties.description: (Required) The object UUID or id of the storage.

properties.name: bootdevice
properties.description: (Optional) Make this storage the boot device. This can only be set for one storage per server!

properties.name: list description
properties.description: storage - (Optional) Connects a storage to the server.

properties.name: object_uuid
properties.description: (Required) The object UUID or id of the network.

properties.name: bootdevice
properties.description: (Optional) Make this network the boot device. This can only be set for one network.

The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Required) The human-readable name of the object. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters.

properties.name: sshkey
properties.description: • sshkey - (Required) This is the OpenSSH public key string (all key types are supported => ed25519, ecdsa, dsa, rsa, rsa1).

properties.name: labels
properties.description: • labels - (Optional) List of labels in the format [ "label1", "label2" ].

properties.name: attributes
properties.description: » Attributes
This resource exports the following attributes:

properties.name: name
properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.name: sshkey
properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.name: labels
properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.name: status
properties.description: status indicates the status of the object.

properties.name: create_time
properties.description: The time the object was created.

properties.name: change_time
properties.description: Defines the date and time of the last object change.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Required) The human-readable name of the object. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters.

properties.name: capacity
properties.description: • capacity - (Required) required (integer - minimum: 1 - maximum: 4096).

properties.name: storage_type
properties.description: • storage_type - (Optional) (one of storage, storage_high, storage_insane).

properties.name: location_uuid
properties.description: • location_uuid - (Optional) Helps to identify which datacenter an object belongs to. Frankfurt is the default.

properties.name: labels
properties.description: • labels - (Optional) List of labels in the format [ "label1", "label2" ].

properties.name: list description
properties.description: template - (Optional) List of labels in the format [ "label1", "label2" ].

properties.name: template_uuid
properties.description: (Required) The UUID of a template. This can be found in the expert panel by clicking more on the template or by using a gridscale_tempalte datasource.

properties.name: password
properties.description: (Optional) The root (Linux) or Administrator (Windows) password to set for the installed storage. Valid only for public templates. The password has to be either plaintext or a crypt string (modular crypt format

properties.name: password_type
properties.description: (Optional) (one of plain, crypt) Required if password is set (ignored for private templates and public Windows templates).

properties.name: sshkeys
properties.description: (Optional) (array of any

properties.name: hostname
properties.description: (Optional) The hostname of the installed server (ignored for private templates and public windows templates).

Note When using official templates using either a password and password_type or at least one SSH public key is required. This is not the case when using custom templates. For official templates password authentication for SSH is enabled by default, so be sure to pick a strong password.

properties.name: attributes
properties.description: » Attributes
This resource exports the following attributes:

properties.name: name
properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.name: location_uuid
properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.description: See Argument Reference above.

properties.name: status
properties.description: status indicates the status of the object.

properties.name: create_time
properties.description: The time the object was created.

properties.name: change_time
properties.description: Defines the date and time of the last object change.

properties.name: location_country
properties.description: Formatted by the 2 digit country code (ISO 3166-2) of the host country.

properties.name: location_iata
properties.description: Uses IATA airport code, which works as a location identifier.

properties.name: location_name
properties.description: The location name.

properties.name: license_product_no
properties.description: If a template has been used that requires a license key (e.g. Windows Servers) this shows the product_no of the license (see the /prices endpoint for more details).

properties.name: last_used_template
properties.description: Indicates the UUID of the last used template on this storage (inherited from snapshots).

properties.name: usage_in_minutes
properties.description: The amount of minutes the IP address has been in use.

properties.name: current_price
properties.description: The price for the current period since the last bill.
